headline: Citi sets CEO Jane Fraser's compensation at $34.5 million for 2024
summary: Citigroup said on Tuesday it had set Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser's 2024 compensation at $34.5 million. The compensation includes $1.5 million of base salary, $4.95 million in...

headline: Citigroup names Nicole Giles chief accounting officer
summary: Citigroup said on Tuesday Nicole Giles will be its chief accounting officer, effective as of February 21. ...
